DOC.brief_summary: The aim of our study is to compare the analgesic effect of topical application of lidocaine-prilocaine cream and lidocaine infiltration during repair of postpartum perineal tears.
DOC.brief_title: Pain Relief During Repair of Postpartum Perineal Tears
DOC.criteria: 1. Gestational age > 37 weeks 2. Uncomplicated pregnancy 3. Single vertex fetus 4. Normal vaginal delivery 5. Women who will accept to participate in the study 1. Women received epidural analgesia 2. Women required episiotomy 3. Women with intact perineum 4. Operative vaginal delivery 5. Allergy to the used drugs
